p: Cells were detached from the substrate surface by incubation with trypsin after a treatment period of 7 days. The medium was removed and substituted by fresh substance-containing medium 2 h prior harvesting. Aliquots of 5.0 × 10 6 cells were transferred to 1.5 mL tubes, washed with ice-cold phosphate-buffered saline (PBS; Sigma-Aldrich) and pellets were collected from three independent experiments and stored at -80°C until further analysis.
